page.title: 04Felixstowe College
page.content: Felixstowe College is a girls' boarding school which was founded in 1929. There are about 330 girls. There are 310 boarders and 20 day girls. Most girls join the school at the age of 11 to the Junior House,{Wycliffe.} In the second year they move into one of the Senior Houses,{Cranmer, Ridley, {Latimer or Tyndale.}In Lower VI the girls spend half a year in their own Houses and then move to {Monkbarns.}In Upper VI girls live in{the Sixth Form {Centre}which comprises{Hooper}and{ {Coverdale}Houses. The Headmistress is{Miss Guinness.} There are 50 staff teaching 25 different subjects. There are specialist rooms and laboratories. The school has 4 hockey pitches which change into 5 rounders pitches, 11 grass tennis courts and 10 hard courts, a swimming pool and gymnasium.
